blog.name: rxy-ben
blog.description: Blog dedicated to Star Wars & Reylo |Asks are always open!|

summary:
Rey
A scavenger toughened by life in Jakku’s harsh deserts, Rey has been drawn into a galaxy-spanning conflict and learned that...
body:
Rey

A scavenger toughened by life in Jakku’s harsh deserts, Rey has been drawn into a galaxy-spanning conflict and learned that her life is being shaped by the mysterious power of the Force. She seeks out Luke Skywalker, the lost Jedi Master, in hopes that he will aid the Resistance against the First Order and help her control her growing powers. But when that quest ends in disappointment, Rey must find a new way forward.

{starwars.com}

Hello! I’m new to Tumblr and the Star Wars/Reylo fandom! I can’t wait to meet so many of you. As many of you have inspired me already. Because I am a newer blog my tags aren’t showing up so hopefully it happens soon so I can meet some of you!

blog.description: Random posts. Just a place to keep all the likes of posts by people cooler than me. I like dragons. And Star Wars. And Marvel.

tags: i just want them to be happy
summary: So. I live for Luke and Anakin interactions. The Vader Lives AU is, as improbable as any au could possibly be, my absolute...
body:
So. I live for Luke and Anakin interactions. The Vader Lives AU is, as improbable as any au could possibly be, my absolute favorite for a variety of reasons and thus I never stop thinking about these two space disasters doing father son stuff.

I was just thinking about how jaded and just so Done with everything Anakin is, how nothing would seem to surprise him anymore, much less actually instill that old sense of wonder.

But now there’s Luke, this precious sunshine child who would find even an insignificant beetle on some boring done-over-again planet and STILL be fascinated by it.

I want Luke basically kidnapping his father for a space!roadtrip and basically forcing all this wonder on Anakin, who surely would not be able to remain impassive in the face of his son’s overwhelming happiness.

summary: Oh what she'd give to hear that laugh
title: Oh what she'd give to hear that laugh
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2S2xRap

by LilibethSonar

Carefully setting the projector on her open palm, Rey says, “Well, these aren’t just baby holos. They’re yours. You know, those from the rusty projector your mother has?”

Ben blanches.

___
Of how Ben Solo returned to the light to prevent his mom from embarrassing him further.

summary: The image that turned grown men (grown men who love a space fantasy for 12 year olds) into raging man-babies, crying about...
caption:
The image that turned grown men (grown men who love a space fantasy for 12 year olds) into raging man-babies, crying about Disney’s SJW conspiracies, feminazis, and missandry. This is western civilization in the 21st century.

#notstarwarsrelated as it was a campaign for Nike, but don’t let that intefere with your confirmation bias. Move along, move along….

blog.name: ao3feed-starwars
blog.title: Star Wars AO3 Feed
blog.description:
An AO3 Feed for the Star Wars - All Media Types tag.

Icon from the Star Wars App.

title: Avengers "Fix" Star Wars
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2STOaLe

by Zumatra_Alder

“BULLSHIT!” Tony yelled as they finished watching The Last Jedi in the privacy of the Avenger’s Compound.
“Tony, Cap doesn’t like that language,” Alva scolded in a sing song voice.
“Well, I call total bullshit on what Disney has done!” Tony complained.
“It wasn’t that bad,” Steve shrugged.
“And Rebels was a pretty good show,” Alva added.
“You only like it because of Thrawn,” Clint pointed out teasingly. Alva blushed.
“Shut up,” she hissed.
“I mean, come on!” Tony went on, “Even the Prequels were better than this!”
“Maybe we should go fix the problem,” Shuri suggested casually.

Words: 740, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Star Wars Prequel Trilogy, Star Wars: The Clone Wars (2008) - All Media Types, MCU
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Characters: Original Female Character(s), Steve Rogers, Tony Stark, T'Challa (Marvel), Shuri (Marvel), Peter Parker, Ned Leeds, Pepper Potts, Bruce Banner, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Clint Barton, Wong (Marvel), Stephen Strange, James “Bucky” Barnes, James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Loki (Marvel), Thor (Marvel), Okoye (Marvel)
  • Additional Tags: Avengers attempt to fix Star Wars, Dr. Strange is not happy, human disasters


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2STOaLe

by Zumatra_Alder

“BULLSHIT!” Tony yelled as they finished watching The Last Jedi in the privacy of the Avenger’s Compound.
“Tony, Cap doesn’t like that language,” Alva scolded in a sing song voice.
“Well, I call total bullshit on what Disney has done!” Tony complained.
“It wasn’t that bad,” Steve shrugged.
“And Rebels was a pretty good show,” Alva added.
“You only like it because of Thrawn,” Clint pointed out teasingly. Alva blushed.
“Shut up,” she hissed.
“I mean, come on!” Tony went on, “Even the Prequels were better than this!”
“Maybe we should go fix the problem,” Shuri suggested casually.
